AccountWillBeCreated: A {{productName}} account will be created for <1>{{email}}</1>. Please complete your registration:
ConfirmOwnerPortalSuccessMessage: {{productName}} owner has been successfully changed. You will be redirected in 10 seconds.
ConfirmOwnerPortalTitle: Please confirm you want to change the {{productName}} owner to {{newOwner}}.
DeleteProfileConfirmation: Attention! You are about to disable your account.
DeleteProfileConfirmationInfo: By clicking "Disable my account" you agree with our <1>Privacy policy.</1>
DeleteProfileSuccessDescription: Your {{productName}} account is successfully disabled. The {{productName}} owner or admin can permanently delete your disabled account.
DeleteProfileSuccessMessageInfo: Please check our <1>Privacy policy</1> to learn more about deleting your account and associated data.
EmailAndPasswordCopiedToClipboard: Email and password copied to clipboard
EnterAppCodeDescription: Enter 6-digit generated code from your app. If you don't have access to your phone, use the backup codes.
PassworResetTitle: Now you can create a new password.
PhoneSubtitle: The two-factor authentication is enabled to provide additional security. Enter your mobile phone number to continue working in the {{productName}}. Mobile phone number must be entered using an international format with the country code.
PortalContinueTitle: Please confirm that you want to reactivate your {{productName}}.
PortalDeactivateTitle: Please confirm that you want to deactivate your {{productName}}.
PortalRemoveTitle: Please confirm that you want to delete your {{productName}}.
SetAppDescription: Two-factor authentication is enabled. Configure your authenticator app to continue working in the {{productName}}. You can use Google Authenticator for <1>Android</1> and <4>iOS</4> or Authenticator for <8>Windows Phone</8>.
SetAppInstallDescription: To connect the app, scan the QR code or manually enter your secret key <1>{{ secretKey }}</1>, and then enter a 6-digit code from your app in the field below.
SuccessDeactivate: Your account has been successfully deactivated. In 10 seconds you will be redirected to the <1>site</1>.
SuccessReactivate: Your account has been successfully reactivated. In 10 seconds you will be redirected to the <1>portal</1>.
SuccessRemoved: Your account has been successfully removed. In 10 seconds you will be redirected to the <1>site</1>.
